abstract.t: This memo proposes an AAA architecture that would incorporate ageneric AAA server along with an application interface to a set ofApplication Specific Modules that could perform application specificAAA functions. A separation of AAA functions required in a multi-domain environment is then proposed using a layered protocolabstraction. The long term goal is to create a generic frameworkwhich allows complex authorizations to be realized through a networkof interconnected AAA servers.
